# configuration suggestions for files */etc/hostapd/hostdapd.conf* */etc/network/interfaces* when using a *wireless adapter* as a *access point*.

= hostapd configuration for boards with 3, 2 and 1 RJ45 connector=
_It was tested with an Atheros miniPCI (ath5k) and a Ralink USB dongle (rt73usb), both provide 802.11g and WPA2 over 2.4Ghz_

{{{
#/etc/hostapd/hostapd.conf
interface=wlan0
bridge=br0
ssid=ALIX-WIFI
driver=nl80211
channel=3
hw_mode=g
ignore_broadcast_ssid=0
auth_algs=1
macaddr_acl=0
wpa=2
wpa_key_mgmt=WPA-PSK
wpa_passphrase=YOUR-PASS-KEY-HERE
wpa_pairwise=TKIP
rsn_pairwise=CCMP
wpa_group_rekey=600
ctrl_interface=/var/run/hostapd
}}}

=  =
= 3 RJ45 connectors =
== ALIX2D13 and ALIX2D3 ==
 * 1 WAN
 * 2 LAN + 1 WLAN
{{{
#/etc/network/interfaces
auto lo
iface lo inet loopback

allow-hotplug eth0
iface eth0 inet dhcp
    up /sbin/iptables-restore /etc/iptables.rules

auto br0
iface br0 inet static
    address 172.16.210.254
    netmask 255.255.255.0
    bridge_ports eth1 eth2 wlan0
    bridge_stp off
    bridge_maxwait 1

iface eth1 inet manual

iface eth2 inet manual

iface wlan0 inet manual
}}}

= 2 RJ45 connectors =
== ALIX2D2 and ALIX6F2 ==
 * 1 WAN
 * 1 LAN + 1 WLAN
{{{
#/etc/network/interfaces
auto lo
iface lo inet loopback

allow-hotplug eth0
iface eth0 inet dhcp
    up /sbin/iptables-restore /etc/iptables.rules

auto br0
iface br0 inet static
    address 172.16.210.254
    netmask 255.255.255.0
    bridge_ports eth1 wlan0
    bridge_stp off
    bridge_maxwait 1

iface eth1 inet manual

iface wlan0 inet manual
}}}

= 1 RJ45 connector =
== ALIX3D2 ==
 * 1 LAN + 1 WLAN
{{{
#/etc/network/interfaces
auto lo
iface lo inet loopback

auto br0
iface br0 inet static
    address 172.16.210.254
    netmask 255.255.255.0
    bridge_ports eth0 wlan0
    bridge_stp off
    bridge_maxwait 1

iface eth0 inet manual

iface wlan0 inet manual
}}}

_Do not forget to persist the changes, otherwise will be lost on next boot_

{{{ 
#alter file using you preferred editor
nano /etc/network/interfaces
remountrw
mv /rw/etc/hostapd/hostapd.conf /ro/etc/hostapd/
mv /rw/etc/network/interfaces /ro/etc/network/
remountro
}}}

_Enable hostapd to start on boot_

{{{ 
remountrw
rebind on
chroot /ro
sysv-rc-conf hostapd on
exit
rebind off
remountro
}}}
